places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Utsav Banswara
address: Udaipur-Dungarpur Link Road, near Maharana Pratap Circle, Wadiya Colony, Banswara, Shyampura, Rajasthan 327001, India

reviews.text: We stayed here during a wedding and the overall experience was excellent. All meals served were fantastic - I personally was very happy with the food, great taste and not very spicy also. Even the housekeeping team was very helpful. I truly enjoyed my short stay at Banswara because of the stay here. Highly recommended!! :)
Nicely treated at hotel with decent stay and delicious food items. Very humble staff. Owner is also very good and oriented to provide good facility within premises.
So it's a once a month visit for me at restaurant, breakfast hours are very lazed out staff , least bothered they are to serve. But main meal hours are well served and tasty meals

This review is for their restaurant.

The food tastes good, jain food available too. We had Jain food only and it was very good.
The ambience is nice.
The staff is also cheerful and good.
Quick service, didn't take hours to get our food on the plate.
The food was really wow. Restaurant is neat and clean. Staffs behaviour is good. I personally enjoyed the food.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Relax Inn
address: Udaipur Road, Banswara, 17, Shiv Colony, Banswara, Shyampura, Rajasthan 327001, India

reviews.text:
We have used Relax inn hotel for almost everything.
Rooms - Best rooms with nice facilities.
The new building has better rooms than the old one.
Food -
Best in banswara still. The chef is a magical guy. He knows what he is cooking.
I still miss the malai kofta and veg lollipop from this place.
Hall-
We used it for a mini function and all our requirements were met for 50 people.
Garden-
Big garden for all the functions you want -150 people
Overall a one stop place for everything.
Service was good but as a stranger unable to identify who are in service but sab iske bina bhi ho gya time se it is a good experience to have a coffee there.

Near to heart of city, hygienic place and environment, quality food and amenities, reasonable rates, friendly and cooperative staff, best stay for family and business personnel, you can consider as first choice for stay in Banswara.
The restaurant is good. The food is average but good. The ambience is very nice.

Hotel Relax Inn Banswara. The tagline "Pride of Banswara" seems to be fitting based on your description of the hotel. The fact that the rooms were very neat and clean indicates that the hotel prioritizes cleanliness and provides a comfortable environment for its guests.

Fast service is always a plus, and it's great that the hotel's restaurant offers delicious food. The fact that people from far away come to dine there is a testament to the quality of the food. Additionally, the positive mention of the hotel's bakery suggests that they offer tasty baked goods as well.

Lastly, the rates for returning customers are quite economical, which implies that the hotel values its loyal customers and provides them with affordable pricing.

Overall, it seems like Hotel Relax Inn Banswara has a lot to offer in terms of cleanliness, prompt service, delicious food, and reasonable rates. It sounds like a place worth considering for anyone visiting Banswara.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Landmark - Best Hotel In Banswara
address: Dungarpur Road, opp. Coco Petrol Pump, Wadiya Colony, Banswara, Shyampura, Rajasthan 327001, India

reviews.text: Services of this hotel is very good. Staff behave is also very good. Food Service is awesome. A variety of food is served in a plate for only ₹150.
Best quality food osum food test only Rs 150

Very poor experience. We initially saw the room and then booked a room verbally. He didn't told us that without payment they will not keep room as booked. But when we again arrived at hotel with luggage he told the room you booked was given to someone else.

Please try another room. We have no choice except to stay in that hotel. Because we have a function in the evening at hotel itself. Never trust the owner of the hotel. They will never co-operate. Very bad experience.

Really a best hotel. Very spacious rooms. We fell in love with the dal of their hotel.

The only minus point was the little parking space. Apart from that everything was good.
Bathrooms are not clean. Rooms are average. Breakfast service is slow.

address: HC3X+37M, Nai Abadi, Banswara, Rajasthan 327001, India

reviews.text: This is good location because it's nearby bus stand. Hotel is old but cleaning and staff are good...
nice place..... I check in there only ...when i go to banswara.....

Surya Palace is a good hotel, providing delicious food at good price. Services are so good but rooms are average.
Their Check out timing is 24 hours from check in.( so please keep in your mind for before early check in. )

Due to official work, I had to stay in hotel for approx 2 weeks.
Hotel is near busstand and very well approachable.
Stay was comfortable.
Rooms were good.
Food available in Anand dining hall, attached was also good.
Staff of restaurant and Ramsingh ji at reception made sure that no discomfort happened to us.
Thanks.

places_with_reviews.name: The Imperial Hotel & Restaurant
address: Opp Indian Oil Petrol Pump, Maharana Prataap Circle, Road, Akshardham, Housing Board, Udaipur, Banswara, Rajasthan 327001, India

reviews.text: It’s an excellent place to stay in Banswara.. The Hygiene is excellent & food is mind blowing.. I can’t expect such food & hygiene in Tier-3 Town.. Amazing & Looking forward to see you again with such great Taste & Hospitality..👍👍

The stay was full of inconvenience. ACs were not working, Staff was incapable and impolite in managing the issues, the food taste was under average, the Breakfast Buffet comprised only 3 items.

Special mentioning of their Staff Kalpesh. I complained him of AC not working at 2:30 am, after hearing my issue, he did not bother to solve it. He hanged up the phone. After waiting for an hour that he would take an action, I had to go downstairs to ask him for a different room. He was in deep sleep, phone receiver was kept aside so that I should not bother him in sleep.

It was a terrible stay.

"The hotel's culinary offerings exceeded my expectations. The diverse menu showcased a fusion of flavors, and each dish was expertly crafted with attention to detail. The presentation was impressive, and the quality of ingredients was evident. The attentive staff and inviting ambiance added to the overall delightful dining experience. Highly recommended for those seeking a culinary treat during their stay."

Food is delicious but Pathetic Service. We visited the restaurant for dinner and wanted to sit on a preferred table but staff doesn't allow even the table is not reserved.
Also service is so slow. We ordered the main course and after almost completing they brought salad
Pathetic service according to the standard they have set.

What should I say? The worst experience ever. The food was not cooked well. Although the service was pretty good yet the taste was tasteless. They need to improve their menu as well and the food quality also. So far, I don't recommend this place at all.

address: Nakshatra Mall, Udaipur, Dungarpur, HC3G+CQW, Link Road, Wadiya Colony, Banswara, Shyampura, Rajasthan 327001, India

reviews.text: Hotel Nakshatra offers impeccable service and luxurious accommodations. The rooms are spacious, well-appointed, and offer stunning views. The staff is warm, attentive, and goes above and beyond to ensure a memorable stay. The on-site amenities, including the fitness center and restaurant, are top-notch. Highly recommend for a delightful experience
Great stay for my business trip! The hotel had everything I needed - comfortable room and a convenient location. The staff were friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend.
